title: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)
descriptions:
Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit! This power tool combo kit comes with everything you need to tackle a wide range of applications. With its compact and lightweight design, this kit is perfect for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts.

The kit includes the DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver, featuring a speed transmission with low and high settings of 0 to 450 RPM and 0 to 1500 RPM respectively. Its power output of 300 UWO ensures efficient and effective drilling. The single sleeve ratcheting chuck, with a size of 1/2-inch, allows for easy bit changes. The ergonomic handle provides comfort and control during extended use.

The DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver is also included in the kit. It boasts a compact and lightweight design, measuring just 5.55 inches from front to back. Weighing only 2.8 lbs, this impact driver is easy to maneuver and reduces user fatigue. The 1-handed chuck loading system accepts 1-inch bit tips, making bit changes quick and hassle-free. The built-in LED light ring, with 3 LEDs, provides superior visibility, even in dark or shadowed areas. The light has a delay time of 20 seconds, ensuring you have ample time to see your work.

This combo kit includes 2 20V Lithium Ion batteries, so you can work for longer periods without having to constantly recharge. The charger is also included, making it convenient to keep your batteries powered up and ready to go. The kit comes in a vibrant Yellow/Black color, ensuring visibility and easy identification on the job site.

Additional features of this combo kit include a superior LED foot light, which enhances visibility and allows you to work with precision. The package contents include 1x DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver, 1x DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver, 2x 20V Lithium Ion Batteries, and 1x Charger.

Upgrade your toolbox with the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit. With its powerful performance, compact design, and convenient features, this kit is a must-have for any DIY project or professional job. Order yours today and experience the DEWALT difference!

Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger in Yellow/Black (DCK240C2). This kit includes everything you need to tackle a wide range of applications with ease.

The DCD771 Drill/Driver is designed to be compact and lightweight, making it comfortable to use for extended periods. It features a 1/2-inch single sleeve ratcheting chuck for easy bit changes and a powerful motor that delivers 300 units watts out (UWO) of power. With a speed transmission that offers both low and high settings (0-450 and 0-1500 RPM), you can easily adjust the speed to match your specific needs. The ergonomic handle provides added comfort and control during use.

The DCF885 Impact Driver is also compact and lightweight, measuring just 5.55 inches front to back. It weighs only 2.8 lbs, making it easy to maneuver in tight spaces. The 1/4-inch hex chuck allows for quick and easy one-handed bit loading, and it accepts 1-inch bit tips. The LED light ring, with its 3 LED lights, provides superior visibility without shadows, making it easier to work in dimly lit areas. The LED lights also have a delay of 20 seconds, ensuring that you have enough time to see your work area before they turn off.

This combo kit includes 2 20V Lithium Ion batteries and a charger, so you'll always have a backup battery ready to go. The batteries provide ample power to get the job done efficiently. The charger is included, so you can easily recharge your batteries when needed.

The Yellow/Black color scheme adds a touch of style to your toolbox, while the LED foot light provides superior visibility, making it easier to see your work area. Whether you're a professional contractor or a DIY enthusiast, this DEWALT Combo Kit is a must-have for any tool collection. It includes the DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver, the DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver, 2 20V Lithium Ion Batteries, and a Charger. Don't miss out on this versatile and powerful tool combo kit. Order yours today!

Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Power Tool Combo Kit! This kit comes complete with everything you need to tackle any project, including 2 batteries and a charger. 

The drill, model DCD771, features a speed transmission with low and high settings, ranging from 0 to 1500 RPM. With a power output of 300 UWO, this compact and lightweight drill is perfect for any task. The chuck is a single sleeve ratcheting type, with a size of 1/2-inch. The ergonomic handle ensures comfort and control during use.

The impact driver, model DCF885, is also compact and lightweight, measuring just 5.55 inches from front to back. Weighing only 2.8 lbs, it is easy to maneuver. The chuck is a 1-handed loading 1/4-inch hex type, accepting 1-inch bit tips. It also features a LED light ring with 3 LEDs, providing superior visibility. The delay time for the LED light is 20 seconds.

Both the drill and impact driver come in a stylish Yellow/Black color scheme. The kit also includes an LED foot light for even more visibility. This combo kit is perfect for a wide range of applications and is ideal for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts.

Package Contents:
- 1x DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver
- 1x DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver
- 2x 20V Lithium Ion Batteries
- 1x Charger

Get the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Power Tool Combo Kit today and experience the power and reliability of DEWALT!

Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit! This powerful and versatile kit includes everything you need to tackle a wide range of applications with ease.

The Drill/Driver, model DCD771, features a compact and lightweight design, making it comfortable to use for extended periods of time. It boasts a high-performance motor with a power output of 300 UWO, providing ample power for any task. With a 1/2-inch single sleeve ratcheting chuck, changing bits is quick and easy. The ergonomic handle ensures optimal comfort and control, reducing fatigue and increasing productivity. The Impact Driver, model DCF885, is equally impressive. It measures just 5.55 inches front to back, making it compact and easy to maneuver in tight spaces. The Impact Driver also comes equipped with a LED light ring with 3 LEDs, providing superior visibility even in low-light conditions. The light has a 20-second delay, ensuring you have enough time to position yourself properly.

This combo kit includes 2 20V Lithium Ion batteries, offering long-lasting power and quick charging. The charger is included, so you can keep your batteries ready for action at all times. The kit comes in a vibrant Yellow/Black color scheme, representing the high-quality and reliability associated with the DEWALT brand.

In addition, the kit features an LED foot light for superior visibility, allowing you to work with precision and accuracy. The LED foot light eliminates shadows, ensuring you can see every detail clearly.

The DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit is perfect for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts. It includes all the essential tools and accessories to tackle any project with confidence. The package contents include 1x DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver, 1x DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver, 2x 20V Lithium Ion Batteries, and 1x Charger.
